document.full_text: when derrick williams transferred from southern california, he made two official visits: to arizona and to memphis. he chose the wildcats, who face the tigers in the first round friday.
document.title: after missing out on williams, memphis gets to see him up close
lines_and_colors: when derrick williams transferred from southern california, he made two official visits: to arizona and to memphis. he chose the wildcats, who face the tigers in the first round friday.
